name: TheBourboner
0:
”Alexa, open The Bourboner.”
”What should I do tonight?”
”What bourbon events are near me?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the bourboner
des:
TheBourboner skill takes all the Bourbon-focused dinners, events and distillery tours from TheBourboner.com's events page and puts it within voice-reach for any Bourbon Enthusiast.

After the skill has been opened, prompt Alexa with any of our suggested phrases and questions to see what Bourbon events are near you. Once you've asked/stated your initial question/phrase, Alexa will ask you for a preferred zip code to search initially (this is ideal if you're traveling or visiting a friend or family member).

Once a valid zip code has been given, the first 5 Bourbon events in that area will be provided and any additional events will be posted on the card within the Alexa app.

So in short:

You: "Alexa, open The Bourboner"

You: "Alexa, what Bourbon events are near me?"

Alexa: [Asks for preferred zip code initially (unless yours is saved on your account which will be used by default - but you can change it at any time.)]

You: "xxxxx" <- (say desired zip code here)

Alexa: [provides list of Bourbon events]

(Everyone packs up, heads out, eats a substantial meal and enjoys the night responsibly.)

- - - - -
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
